actions.clear.confirm: Yes, I have a corrupted storage
actions.clear.plugin.warn: All installed plugins will be removed and the app will be reloaded. Plugin settings will still be retained. This is only neccessary if you have a corrupted storage.
actions.clear.theme.warn: All installed themes will be removed and the app will be reloaded. This is only neccessary if you have a corrupted storage.
actions.clear.plugin.title: Clear plugin storage?
actions.clear.theme.title: Clear theme storage?
developer.customurl.label: Load from custom url
developer.customurl.sublabel: Load Revenge from a custom endpoint.
developer.errorboundary: Which ErrorBoundary do you want to trip?
theme.safemode: You are in Safe Mode, meaning themes have been temporarily disabled.
theme.safemode.disable: If a theme appears to be causing the issue, you can press below to disable it persistently.
theme.refetch.title: Theme refetched
theme.refetch.prompt: A reload is required to see the changes. Do you want to reload now?
theme.delete.prompt: Are you sure you wish to delete ${theme.data.name}?
plugin.safemode: You are in Safe Mode, so plugins cannot be loaded. Disable any misbehaving plugins, then return to Normal Mode from the General settings page.
plugin.cleardata.prompt: Are you sure you wish to clear the data of ${plugin.manifest.name}?
plugin.delete.prompt: Are you sure you wish to delete ${plugin.manifest.name}? This will clear all of the plugin's data.
